about_the_game:
Another pack in TK.Projects long, successful line of products, this pack contains more of exactly what you need for more variation and sonic palettes for your games. Dramatic Fantasy RPG Music Vol.1 contains energetic music for Boss Battles, pleasant music for Fields, dramatic orchestrated music for Excitement, Field Town, Village and Dungeon, and more!

Features:

* 25 BGM, 20 ME, 10 BGS for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Music for fantasy, adventure and much more!
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engines of your choice!
